condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Is HART Interface in Scope?)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(Is HART in C300 Controller?)*>,))
name: Show HART Interface Questions
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Number of HART Interface Types,Number of HART Devices,Is HART in C300 Controller?)*>
<*SELECTVALUE(Is HART in C300 Controller?:No)*>
description: Display questions when Is HART Interface in Scope? = Yes
